description: 1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1689) - Raise canopy to 2.5 metres above courtyard level, Crown clean as specified6 x Field Maple (applicant's ref. T1692-7) - Reduce by up to 1m away from fenceline on side of sports court;1 x Ash (applicant's ref. T1698) - Reduce crown on building side by up to 1.5 metres;1 x Tibetan Cherry (applicant's ref. T1699b) - Reduce crown on leaning side to help tree appear that it is not leaning over;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1700) - Lift crown 4 metres above upper ground level (grass field), Crown clean;2 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1703, T1714) - Lift crown 4 metres above ground level, Crown clean;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1701) - Reduce crown 2 metres from building;(1 x dead Bird Cherry (applicant's ref. T1705) - Fell and plant replacement);6 x Indian Bean Tree (applicant's ref. T1706 - 11) - Lift crown 4 metres above ground level, Crown clean;1 x Indian Bean Tree (applicant's ref. T1712) - Lift crown 4 metres above ground level, Crown clean, (Remove fallen limb);1 x Sycamore (applicant's ref. T1713) - Lift crown 4 metres above ground level, Crown clean;1 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1720) - Remove low epicormic growth;2 x Oak (applicant's ref. T1721, T1722, T1724) - Lift crown 3 metres above ground level, Crown clean;(1 x Indian Bean Tree (applicant's ref. T1725) - Remove torn out branch);1 x Crab Apple (applicant's ref. T1726) - Remove lowest branch to stem;1 x Elder (applicant's ref. T1727) - Reduce crown down to 1.5 metres above ground level;1 x Cherry (applicant's ref. T1728) - Lift crown 3 metres above ground level, Crown clean;1 x Weeping Silver Pear (applicant's ref. T1732) - Face in and shape all over;1 x Hazel (applicant's ref. T1733) - Reduce crown down to 2 metres above ground level
